column4: Could someone assist me with the install of ndiswrapper. I am struggling... again.
you got to a little more specific ;)
I am using a USB stick to transfer the ndiswrapper tar.gz file.
can you extract it and compile?
I don't think so. But I am not sure. (forgive me, I am new to all this)
you need to install linux-headers-$(uname -r) and build-essential or else it wont compile
building from source and installing a binary .deb are fundamentally different ;)
I have installed ndiswrapper from a .dab package. Whereabouts will it be stored so I can access it?
I have found it. Forgive me.
if it worked, sudo modprobe ndiswrapper should work
